input.sentences: there were propaganda posters for location on display .
they were advocating for new homes .
they emphasized the rate of homelessness in the country .
they featured effective imagery and wording .
they really highlighted how bad the problem was .
output.sentences: The housing department of Scotland is seeking your help in raising 200 million towards more housing developments being built.
Due to the growing population it's been reported that 10,000 homes are needed to be built but the budget only allows for just over 5,000.
Just last year 40,000 people had reported being homeless.
If this continues at this rate, within the next five years 142,000 will report being homeless due to the small amount of housing available.
Time is running out and we desperately need help in raising funds so that Scotland will have the housing situation stabilized withing the next 50 years.
